website_summaries.verdict: The type of camera to take on trips and photo walks when you want everything on one camera body.
pros: Included pop-up flash offers decent illumination in low-light
The combination 40x optical and 80x digital zoom performs well for telescopic shooting
cons: The image for video recording is cropped, limiting what you see when shooting
The auto focus takes time to resolve with moving subjects

customer_reviews.title: great first step up from a point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I have been interested in photography for a long time and always managed to get some great shots with my little kodak or my phone. However I wanted to upgrade to make my memories better. This is a great camera for a first time DSLR. I am still experimenting with the settings but the functions are so easy to understand and snapbridge is an amazingly easy app to use. I cannot wait to be fully aware of what this camera can do when I learn more about the settings, especially in low light situations. I would definitely recommend the coolpix to anyone who hasn't used a DSLR and for the price it really is a steal
customer_reviews.author: kazbat

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife. She loves it to say the least. It is perfect for her as she is somewhat of an amateur and this camera is easy to use and does a lot for you. Great quality pictures and videos also. The camera was exactly what I expected for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran knight

customer_reviews.title: If you wanted a semi-pro, this is the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: If you wanted a semi-pro, this is the camera for you at an affordable price, plus you don't need a telephoto!
customer_reviews.author: dr.pjmasiak

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom, great connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for holiday as it meant my daughter could instantly pull the pics to her phone for sharing rather than need a card reader or pc. It didn't disappoint, easy to use (not touched the surface of all the features and modes) good picture quality and a 40 x optical zoom means it can do so much more than a phone camera Excellent in low light Battery life was good, but goes quicker if linked automatically to phone for downloading pics on the go
customer_reviews.author: Andy the hypnotist

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for a compact camera. It is professional although you can not change the lense.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing twice over
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this camera right size easy to use Unfortunately the unit locked up after setting the date and could not be corrected A call to Nikon support was useless only suggesting a change of battery A replacement unit malfunctioned in exactly the same way Time to look at another manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for first timers.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, great value for money. My first decent camera so I haven't got much to compare it to. Love the snapbridge app which is so easy to download pictures to my phone. Many different modes so I mainly stick to auto. Super camera for a first timer who wants good pics.
customer_reviews.author: Trego

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed manual in Deutsch!!
customer_reviews.text: The camera was a gift for my granddaughter. Fabulous performance BUT the quick start manual supplied was in GERMAN. Not good enough Granddaughter was sufficiently IT savvy to Google search and find an English version. Had she not it would have meant returning the camera as Amazon were unable to contact the seller or still headscratching about how to turn it on
customer_reviews.author: Grey haired rocker

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing pictures. Very clear and detailed. Better than any smartphone. Took over 300 pictures some with flash and still on same batteries. Doddle to use. It hasn't got a viewfinder but has a 3 inch screen which can be tilted and moved. The only minor issue is at or near maximum zoom, if it is poor light, it can struggle to focus. But this is nitpicking for what is a very good camera. Perfect for upgrading from a small compact to something a bit more useable in terms of features and ability. A natural progression before you get an SLR. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: For a step up from my phone camera absolutely brilliant for the price. I have nothing bad to say. Obviously if you expect brilliantly professional quality then this maybe isn't the camera for you. Photography is only my hobby and I'm still learning so it's just what I wanted. I'm glad I went for a bridge over a simple point and shoot as I'm not ready for dslr. The camera is light weight and simple to use, I haven't downloaded no user manual as I got 1 that explained things perfectly. I would recommend this camera 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and well priced. Powerful zoom producing clear distinct pictures. Paired easily with my phone via its SnapBridge app. All plastic, so will need good protection from the hot sun on a safari, otherwise a pleasing product at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Saksunny

customer_reviews.title: It's great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for photoshoots, macro photography and taking pictures of the moon. It's great. If Im honest I would have bought a full DSLR ig I'd had the money but if you're looking fir a budget camera that will do most of what a DSLR will do you could do much worse than this bad boy...
customer_reviews.author: Simon D H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Perfect compromise with a digital and reflex I love make pic to the moon and pic are perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ragusa Maria Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loved it! We've taken so many high quality pictures with this camera - definitely a good buy for those who love photography (and are amateurs).
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for beginners. I wanted a digital camera to take pictures of my baby. The quality is excellent in comparison to my smartphone camera. I am so glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Mell

customer_reviews.title: Family photos
customer_reviews.text: It runs with AA batteries and zoom is bad. Good for family photos and horrible for video shooting like YouTube channel etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Good quality camera for the price it is a Nikon, top notch as far as i am concerned, easy to set up with good quick start instructions, my 7 year old son picked it up and sorted it in minutes....
customer_reviews.author: CJ101

customer_reviews.title: quality all round
customer_reviews.text: all features work well/not the best of control from me, but the camera smooths all your demands
customer_reviews.author: vasculitus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I could possibly need to photograph merchandise for my business. I am a novice at photography but the camera is very easy to use. I don't use the set up to transfer my pictures wirelessly to a mobile device, there is a cable to enable you to connect the camera directly to a computer or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Louise E.

customer_reviews.title: The truth about this Camara
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money it took me about 6 months to decide on wich Camara to get and I made the right decision 100%
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Love my Camera
customer_reviews.text: Just love my camera... a replacement from my other camera.. its easy to work and takes a brilliant picture!
customer_reviews.author: linzx

customer_reviews.title: Great results.
customer_reviews.text: A great camera.The zoom lens captures detailed images and the ✂️ option enables you to crop your photo whilst still keeping the original . A great, easy to use camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nikon B500 camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good for photos but very disappointed with video, very poor light levels hard to see a clear picture in video mode . Maybe I’m not up to speed with video settings but really poor images.
customer_reviews.author: R C.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon B500 Coolpix Digital Compact Camera
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant camera thats easy to use and the picture quality is excellent even at full zoom , battery life is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: MR J P DEAS

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: A versatile camera, with a very good zoom and the screen can swing out to able to view in bright sun light.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C. G. Baillie-searle

customer_reviews.title: I really liked but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this one. Very good for beginners! The only thing I think it should change, is that they should say explicitly that you can't play with aperture or shutter speed, only ISO. Apart from that, nice pictures of the moon!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn st

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera as a birthday present for my husband and he was really pleased with the camera which he used on our holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Una Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for beginners ,and very good quality pictures. With 4 good batteries from kodak it hold up to 1000 photos.
customer_reviews.author: Catalin N Bivolaru

customer_reviews.title: Very good for amateur photographers
customer_reviews.text: You get great photos with the nikon B500 and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Ged

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is s great product can’t really fault it does exactly what it should
customer_reviews.author: Carole Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Good camera with good zoom
customer_reviews.text: Takes very good pictures but I find it a bit heavy and difficult to hold where you don’t accidentally press buttons , but a lot of camera for the money
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fox

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with excellent zoom capability and a built in flash.
customer_reviews.text: Compact size with excellent zoom capability. Light weight and comfortable to hold with one hand. All the programmes any amateur will ever need. Cheaper batteries than the exclusive ones previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Wanted an easy to operate and understand camera good enough to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an easy to operate and understand camera good enough to take photos of wildlife in the garden. This camera is ideal for this and so much more too. Excellent item.
customer_reviews.author: bijouinnuendo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value and does a great job. Would recommend this camera, though slightly awkward to use for left-handers.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Something that you want
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, although I haven't used it yet. More details about this after my holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Kostas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is what I want in a camera and the service was excellent. Would recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.author: d robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: A good quality "point and shot" plus much more. Easy to use and brilliant results.
customer_reviews.author: Colin C. Blower

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: It takes decent photos, but it’s really glitchy. It freezes or lines of colours will appear on the screen before it turns itself off. Started doing this first time I used it, but apart from that it takes really nice photos
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present for my husband. It's very easy to use and good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: spend a little more and get a better camera waiting for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Smith

customer_reviews.title: Take pictures
customer_reviews.text: Marvellous product works with wifi remote control on mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Halfbee

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. I'm a novice and this is a great camera to start off with
customer_reviews.author: Allison and Mike porter

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: It dose what I want it to do pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: uksuedenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera , easy to use tested in garden , bird pictures great, but going to new york soon im sure it will perform well there
customer_reviews.author: MRS F.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Box was slightly bashed. Normally no problem but was a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, for me it is handy to be powered by AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Starter for photography
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a starter to get into photography- pleased so far but only used a few times - still getting use to controls
customer_reviews.author: T. Pattison

customer_reviews.title: good value sometimes zoom is unfocused when recording a video
customer_reviews.text: good value sometimes zoom is unfocused when recording a video, not good, blurry quality when taking pictures in dark conditions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the easy to use high quality result here I would recommend this camera for the novice hoping to return hope with great pics
customer_reviews.author: Majella

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far a very good camera. No instructions with it though and had to download from Nikon website.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product other than the absence of the instruction manual
customer_reviews.author: ROGER J WILKS

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: An excellent, working and good looking camera for basic to intermediate photos. Arrived extremely fast, and the price was reasonable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Drachus

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: SUPER DUPER CAMERA, VERY CLEAR PICTURES AND EASY TO USE - VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: already taken some great shots and I'm no expert
customer_reviews.text: Everything and more I expected, already taken some great shots and I'm no expert!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great camera super pics from it and was delivered on ...
customer_reviews.text: A great camera super pics from it and was delivered on time well packaged .photo attached taken with camera.
customer_reviews.author: girva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, takes great pictures just need more practise to improve my photography!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: Takes absolutely ages to focus and actually take a picture. Can;t take more than one photo at a time (unless you change the settings and even then it's very slow to take more than one picture at a time). Auto exposure is terrible. Cheap plasticy feel. Really regret buying this... very dissapinting.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service. Camera was delivered promptly and although the box had been opened I can’t see that anything is missing. It has been bought as a present and as I know nothing about camera I am unable to comment on functionality. Although as I was checking it worked I took a lovely picture of the recent supermoon, craters and all, and this was without knowing what I was doing so I would recommend it being good for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Donna Heatley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased Christmas present for husband having fun using it
customer_reviews.author: readingnana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has been very impressed with the camera and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL D CLARKE

customer_reviews.title: Great photos . Easy. Multiple options.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to understand the multiple options. Great results on auto mode. Small but useful collection of effects to edit photos on the go (saves both edited and unedited copies). Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy snapper.
customer_reviews.text: This is a camera I've looked at for awhile, I have a Nikon DLSR with different lenses, but I needed something easier to snap away with. So I decided on this model and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: whenitsdone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, but would have liked a viewfinder also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I give two stars to the seller ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I give two stars to the seller because the box was a little open, as if they had already used it, also did not bring the user manual or the warranty. It is good to mention that you must buy an SD memory with this camera, otherwise you can only take 3 photos.
customer_reviews.author: Eldri

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you expect the WiFi Snapbridge app to work properly
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine camera.. really let down by the Snapbridge app for ios and android. I could not get this app to work, it won't transfer photos to my phone or tablet. Please read the reviews of this software in the app stores before you buy the camera if you want to transfer to your phone
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: Early days yet but service great and product looking good
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: sort the app out for iOS and i'd be happy
customer_reviews.author: Mr Lazy

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was delivered to me today and I love it! I've only ever used the camera on my phone and this one is so easy to use. Just waiting for my memory card to be delivered now as you can only take about 5 photos before the memory runs out. Also still trying to figure out how to connect it to my phone using the snapbridge app, but other than that, this is a brilliant camera especially for the price. Perfect for any beginner.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera and even an old man like me found it comparatively simple to get good results.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Landon

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice little camera for any level of photography skill. Easy to use. Lovely quality pictures. Really good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lily
